content.content: General Updates Busy week with core units and discussions in the forum. Know Your MIP:  None this and last week. Coming up later in the month: EURDAI   Collateral Onboarding:  Mandated actors are working hard on Real-World Finance and and ETH-C vault.  Core Units Updates:   @juan asked: What are the critical functions that core units must cover as continuity for the Protocol?  You can follow live developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network    Recent Calls   Core Unit Launch Pod Session #2: Governance Alpha Core Unit   Calls Coming up  Tomorrow! Friday March 12: Core Unit Tools #2: Sablier  Next Wednesday, March 17:  Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions #3: Smart Contracts Core Unit  Next Friday, March 19: Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions #4: Real-World Finance @sebventures  Coming up: Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions #5: Content Production @seth   Core Units in RFC   Growth Core Unit @nadia   Smart Contract Core Unit @derek   Content Production Core Unit @seth   MakerDAO Shop @coulter   Core Units Drafts in Progress Links and updated Core Unit statuses on coreunit.makerdao.network  Updated: Strategic Communications, PR and Marketing @kathleen  Front End @Derek  Integrations @liberuum  Governance Communications @david.utro  Oracles @nik  Operational Support @amy.jung @juan   Interesting topics of conversations    MKR Incentives and vesting discussions launched by Smart Contract budget  There will be an opportunity to dive into SC during the Core Unit Launch Pod Session next Wednesday and adding general incentives as a topic of discussion for G&R Call the following Thursday.    Signed @amyjung @juan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

General Updates @juan and I have been continuing our work on supporting core units in development and collecting additional resources that may minimize friction for individuals and teams looking to start core units. Know Your MIP:  Last Friday, KYM#6: DSSGov Incentives   Collateral Onboarding:  Yesterday: Kain & @kevinwildenradt from Synthetix, SNX and sUSD   MIP6 & Further Discussion  Recording coming soon   None for next week / Will be skipping Collateral Onboarding Call and time repurposed for Core Unit Launch Pod Session #1: Growth Core Unit   Core Units Updates: Resources:  You can follow live developments of Core Units on our resource board  Opolis Employment Commons: Presentation, Slides  If you or you know someone who might be a good fit, encourage them to check out Core Units I Wish Existed   New! Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions #1: Growth Core Unit, Next Wednesday, March 3  Following moved into Formal Submission:   Core unit framework (Dropped amendments to the MIP24, added operational support responsibility for setting core unit IDs)  Risk Core Unit (increased budget 46,500 DAI and added receivable address)  Governance Core Unit (updated mandate and increased budget 15,000 DAI)  Real World Finance Core Unit (Updated mandate)  Core Units in RFC   Growth Core Unit @nadia   New core unit drafts in progress  Governance Communications @Davidutro  Oracles @NikKunkel   Interesting topics of conversations    Clarity and alignment on MakerDAO vision, objectives, and roadmap Standardization at the higher level: MKR Vesting, “Budget” processes, etc Minimizing lift for developing and proposing a core unit Pathways for those who want to join core units / be contributors Facilitator remuneration Sourcing and recruiting talent (especially “rockstar” developers) Developing healthy MakerDAO culture Quality assurance when it comes to hiring or onboarding Facilitators and units  Signed @amyjung @juan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Operational Support Weekly Update: March 25-30, 2021 General Updates New MIPs Portal whaaaaat?  Also, lots of facilitating - head to the discussions section  MIPs Portal v1.1   We’ve helped Governance Alpha to launch an improved version of the MIPs Portal.  Improved search. Subproposals Mode. Better visualization.  Know Your MIP:  None this and last week.  Collateral Onboarding:  None this and last week. Next week: Bancor, April 7  Followed by: SolidBlock, April 14   Core Units Updates: Follow live developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network  New: Important dates and deadlines. (Thanks to @Davidutro for collecting the dates).  Past Calls  Core Unit Tools #4: Otonomos + OtoCo.io  Framing a Framework for MKR as Compensation  Calls Coming up    21.04 | Core Unit Launch Pod Session #6: GovComms with @davidutro (Agenda coming soon)  Core Units being drafted   Strategic Marcomms Core Unit @kathleen   Growth Core Unit @nadia   Renamed! Protocol Engineering Core Unit @derek   Content Production Core Unit @seth   Governance Communications Core Unit @davidutro   MakerDAO Shop @coulter   Core Units Drafts in Progress  Front End @Derek  Integrations @liberuum  Oracles @NikKunkel  Operational Support @amyjung @juanjuan   Interesting topics of conversations     1, 2, 3, Blindspots check! Core Units we need? Juan asks if there are any vital functions not covered by the current set of core units.  [Discussion] Core Units Feedback: Share your perspective on how core units are developing.  Call for Proposal Framework: Operational Support proposes a framework to further nurture high-level needs from the MakerDAO community, build potential Facilitator candidates in a pipeline, and offer an opportunity for crowdsourcing best solutions. Call for Proposal Grants: Propose your ideas for what a Grant core unit could be.  97 Initiatives from the MakerDAO Community : See all the efforts from the community.    Wanted: MKR Compensation Working Group After the MKR Compensation Framework call, we’re trying to assemble a diverse yet small group to put forward a proposal for Governance.  Current Core Units (Facilitator or contributor) Proposed Core Units (Facilitator or contributor) 3rd Party Large MKR Holder Community Member holding no/little MKR  Related Forum Posts   [Discussion] Core Unit Budget, Incentives and Vesting : Amy summarizes conversations from the smart contract core unit presentation + thread to discuss core unit budget, incentives and vesting beyond one core unit.  Should we burn the admin keys? An argument for minting MKR: Juan proposes and frames a framework for MKR as compensation.  Signed @amyjung @juanjuan That’s all for us

General Updates Slower week, as @amyjung enjoys a well-deserved break. We keep trying to help Core Units to onboard to the DAO, and working on different pillars to make this happen. Know Your MIP:   @ultraschuppi  will soon present the EURDai Declaration of Intent. Stay tuned for the date! Will publish the agenda soon.  Collateral Onboarding:   @mrabino1 has posted 6s State of the Business as we wait for MIP21 to go through the finish line. More collateral than onboarding, but @tadeo made this cool visualization that shows the collateral that’s backing each Dai.  Core Units Updates: Resources:  You can follow live developments of Core Units on coreunit.makerdao.network  If you or you know someone who might be a good fit, encourage them to check out Core Units I Wish Existed    Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions #1: Growth Core Unit already out! Check the video.   Next Wednesday, March 10th, we’ll have Session #2: Governance Alpha Core Unit. Join @longforwisdom, @prose11, @elihu, and @blimpa on their plan to decentralize Governance.  Core Unit Tools: Gnosis Safe   Core Units in RFC   Growth Core Unit with @nadia   Core Units drafts in progress   New! @Derek as the Smart Contracts Core Unit Facilitator.  New! Just when you thought that swag was a thing of the past, @coulter proposes this draft!  New! @Kathleen_Chu posted a draft for Strategic Marcomms. Check it out here. Governance Communications @Davidutro  Oracles @NikKunkel   Interesting topics of conversations    Clarity and alignment on MakerDAO vision, objectives, and roadmap Standardization at the higher level: MKR Vesting, “Budget” processes, etc Minimizing lift for developing and proposing a core unit Pathways for those who want to join core units / be contributors Facilitator remuneration Sourcing and recruiting talent (especially “rockstar” developers) Developing healthy MakerDAO culture Quality assurance when it comes to hiring or onboarding Facilitators and units  Signed @amyjung @juanjuan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

General Updates This week’s update is a bit longer than usual due to an exciting announcement: @juan and I have been a bit quiet on the development of our Operational Support Core Unit proposal because these past weeks we’ve been working on a merger with @wouter’s core unit: the Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit. From OS point of view, this Core Unit is a level up, retaining most of our core mandate, but giving it more structure and strategy. The biggest change will be that SES will continue to incubate a selected, limited number of Core Units (we have been covering all), and will not cover DAO-wide operational support in a traditional sense (such as DAO resource accounting and reporting). Below are the list of OS initiatives in the works and details on status in the merger. Juan and I will continue to support these projects as Operational Support to its completion. We also recognize there’s a period of time where SES will not be officially mandated (til June), therefore we also took this into consideration in covering projects during the transition period. Current Supported Projects (Support til ~June)     Lead Project Status     Both > Juan Weekly updates in G&R Will be given by Juan   Juan MKR Compensation: 1) Juan will help the Working Group to the first stage: getting Reps, set up with first meeting, then checking in on the progress. 2) Both of us are getting sentiments from Core Units in RFC, Public Draft, Approved on how they want to move forward with incentives/MKR while the overarching framework is being defined. Bootstrap & Handoff. Not actively in scope for SES   Amy > Juan Grants Foundation Grants has sunset. While it doesn’t cover a traditional “DAO Grants Program” per se, a form will exist in SES as “sponsorships”   Amy Project Compass, the framework for gathering and setting DAO vision. Will continue to contribute to the framework. SES is working on a framework for core units defining their vision/mission.   Juan MIPs Portal Next version complete. Will hand-off to Governance   Amy Sourcing talent & incubation. This has been quite small scale (like Autonomous MakerDAO and grants) and not an official initiative. SES  will cover a part of this through the Sponsorship and Incubation Programs    Core Unit Support (Most will merge to SES) Most of the work we’ve been doing to help core units at early stages will continue to SES, but in a more formalized incubator model: Will continue to SES in limited scope or handed off as research  Helping review & give feedback on core unit proposal drafts Develop resources and tooling Supporting teams interested in support / incubation Reminders for process and timeframe Multisig Accounting & Invoicing Resources DAO Operations Comparison Research Legal framework, resources, and core unit with @layerzero  (Did not start) Core Unit Reporting  Not actively in near-term scope for SES  DAO Core Unit Costs & People Overview  Feel free to reach out if you have questions or concerns!  Now back to our regularly scheduled updates… Know Your MIP:  Tomorrow! Friday 13:00 UTC Know your MIP #7: Declaration of Intent - eurDai   Collateral Onboarding:  Yesterday: Bancor Recording  Next Wednesday: SolidBlock, April 14   Core Units Updates: Follow live developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network  Calls Last Week  Core Unit Tools #4: Otonomos + OtoCo.io Recording  Framework for MKR Compensation Community Call: Grants with special guest, @Monet-supply  Calls Coming up  April 21:  Core Unit Launch Pod Session #6: GovComms with @davidutro (Agenda coming soon)  Core Units in Formal Submission   Growth Core Unit @nadia   Renamed! Protocol Engineering Core Unit @derek   MakerDAO Shop @coulter   Content Production Core Unit @seth   Core Units in RFC   New! Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit @juan, @wouter   Strategic Marcomms Core Unit @kathleen   Governance Communications Core Unit @davidutro   Core Units Drafts in Progress  Front End @Derek  Integrations @lollike  Oracles @NikKunkel   Interesting topics of conversations    Important development within one of the key DeFi legal/regulatory areas. Emerging global AML/KYC framework and DeFi (and Maker)  BD team/Growth CU wants to increase communication to the Maker Community  Check out these monthly reports from Real World Finance  Informal vote to move to Discord Wanted: After the MKR Compensation Framework call, we’re trying to assemble a diverse yet small group to put forward a proposal for Governance. Today is the last day to propose yourself!  Current Core Units (Facilitator or contributor) Proposed Core Units (Facilitator or contributor) 3rd Party Large MKR Holder Community Member holding no/little MKR    Signed @amyjung @juan That’s all for us

discourse_list.title: Operational Support Weekly Update: April 29 - May 6, 2021

content.content: General Updates It’s been a slower week for Operational Support, but a wild week for MakerDAO at large   Know Your MIP:  Last week: KYM #8- MIP50: Direct Deposit Module Recording  None coming up next week   Collateral Onboarding:  MCO2 Token Recording None coming up next week   Core Units Updates: It’s a notable moment in the MakerDAO organizational development. The amount of new core units being proposed has slowed down. We’ve completed “Wave 1” with teams receiving budget. We’re at “Wave 2” - with the second group, giving us a total of 7 core units. “Wave 3” is coming into Formal Submission with 2 core units. We’ve observed core units carving their own spaces, even different ways of work / principles being challenged. Observations & Questions that have been brought up:  What happens when one core unit’s principles are different than another? What kinds of conflicts are coming up? How are they resolved? When and for what is a good time to consider standardizing / striving for consistency? (Notably budget reporting has come up) Should core units be allowed to nurture a treasury using requested budget? Expectations around core unit proposal & development: People who want to contribute in smaller, leaner aspects  Follow live developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network  Past Calls  Core Unit Rituals #1: OKRs for Core Units Recording   Calls Coming up  Introducing: Weekly Core Unit Office Hours    Core Units in Formal Submission   Strategic Marcomms Core Unit @kathleen   Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit @juan, @wouter    Core Units in RFC   Governance Communications Core Unit @davidutro    Core Units Drafts in Progress  Oracles @NikKunkel    Interesting Posts  Retiring Community Calls April 2021 Financial Reports   Signed @amyjung @juan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Generally, @juan and I have been working on supporting other teams develop their core units, as well as setting our own Operational Support objectives + writing our Core Unit proposals & budgets. Know Your MIP:  Last Friday, KYM#4: MIP34 & MIP48: Streaming Payments via the Keg  Yesterday, KYM#5: MIP43: Term Lending Module (TLM) / Yield Protocol   Collateral Onboarding:  Next Wednesday: Fortunafi  Fortunafi is a yield and lending protocol for tokenized real world, cash flowing assets.    Core Units Updates:   Core Unit Community Call with @flipflopflapdelegate @juan @iaammeeoh, @prose11   Read and give feedback before ~ end of next week before it goes into frozen period!   Core unit framework @juan, @elprogresso, @iaammeeoh   Risk Core Unit @primoz   Governance Core Unit @longforwisdom   Real World Finance Core Unit @sebventures  This Core Unit also posted a Monthly Report       New drafts of core units posted   Growth Core Unit (Nadia)  Marketing Core Unit (Seth)    Core Units in draft   Smart Contracts (Derek)  Front End (Derek)  Strategic Communications, PR and Marketing (Kathleen) Ops (Amy/Juan)    If you or you know someone who might be a good fit, encourage them to check out Core Units I Wish Existed   Call coming up with Opolis in 2 weeks   Interesting conversations on a few topics  Facilitator Responsibilities  Responsible for budget Expected to communicate with governance You can have a role in the team (ie. PM), and still be a facilitator. Depending on how it’s managed, it doesn’t need to be two separate roles.   Facilitator Salaries  Good conversation around transparency and setting expectations for future core units in  #core-unit-operating-model-onboarding  Convo Kicked off by Governance’s budget    FAQ coming soon    Signed @amyjung @juan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
